Supplier_ID, FName, FNum, FCity, SubordinateIndustry, FContacts, ContactPhone, FAddress, TType, FStatus, FDescribe, FCreatePersonID, FCreateTime, LastModifiedBy, LastModificationTime
mapper.update:
update
set FName = #{FName}, FNum = #{FNum}, FCity = #{FCity}, SubordinateIndustry = #{SubordinateIndustry}, FContacts = #{FContacts}, ContactPhone = #{ContactPhone}, FAddress = #{FAddress}, TType = #{TType}, FStatus = #{FStatus}, FDescribe = #{FDescribe}, FCreatePersonID = #{FCreatePersonID}, FCreateTime = #{FCreateTime}, LastModifiedBy = #{LastModifiedBy}, LastModificationTime = #{LastModificationTime} where Supplier_ID = #{Supplier_ID}
mapper.select: select s.name FCreatePerson,s1.name LastModifiedPerson, from f LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF s ON f.FCreatePersonID=s.staff_id LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF s1 ON f.LastModifiedBy=s1.staff_id where f.Supplier_ID = #{Supplier_ID}

select s.name FCreatePerson,s1.name LastModifiedPerson, from f LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF s ON f.FCreatePersonID=s.staff_id LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF s1 ON f.LastModifiedBy=s1.staff_id where 1=1
and ( f.FName LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.SubordinateIndustry LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FContacts LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FAddress LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
[fhstart] ORDER BY f.FCreateTime DESC [fhend]
select s.name FCreatePerson,s1.name LastModifiedPerson, from f LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF s ON f.FCreatePersonID=s.staff_id LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF s1 ON f.LastModifiedBy=s1.staff_id

select top 100 Supplier_ID,FName,FNum,isnull(FName,'无名称')+'/'+isnull(FNum,'无编号') FSelectOption from f where 1=1
and ( FName LIKE '%'+ #{KEYWORDS}+'%' or FNum LIKE '%'+ #{KEYWORDS}+'%' )
order by f.FNum
